author: Morgan Sung
title: YouTube and TikTok creators pivot to DIY face mask tutorials
description: With everyone scrambling to find face masks to wear, DIY tutorials are thriving on YouTube and TikTok. Many of these videos do more than just teach you how to craft a mask out of stuff you have at home. TikTok creator and model Marc Sebastian primarily uses h…
